As soon as Straight Shot gets the device, Quickstride turns around to head =
back to the tunnels.  She smiles to Kup.

"Thanks Kup, don't worry, I'll ke=
ep my end of the bargain no matter what!  Now, ta find my brother and get t=
his party started!"

In the tunnel, Tucson puts up his headlights, and scan=
s the tunnels. He does catch a faint signature resonating from his sensors.=


"You're right Perceptor, it is Rodimus.  And by the way, about all that y=
ou told me, I'm glad you did.  Now I know everything there is to know.  I m=
ay not have been able to read Kups' reviews of these tunnels, but I will be=
 sure to do so when we get back to the Ark.  And I'm not mad at you for any=
thing Perceptor.  In fact, I'm highly proud of you for expressing the coura=
ge to confess.  Now, let's go find Rodimus and bring him back to the Ark.

=
As they were conversing, Quickstride had made it to the mouth of the tunnel=
, as Straight Shot dismounts and kneels down beside it.

" Okaaaay, looks l=
ike we're taking a real shot in the dark Quickstride."

The maximal transfo=
rms into robot mode and kneels down.

"Yeah, big time.  Okay, let's go."

H=
e helps to lower her down into the tunnel.  She can hear Tucson loud and cl=
ear.

"I hear him!  Follow me!"

She begins to make her way into the tunnel=
, following her brother's voice.  The bean pods once again react in Quickst=
ride's gut as a noxious gas fills the cavern.

" What's that smell?"

Quick=
stride gives a sheepish grin.

"Sorry. That - happens when I overdose on th=
e bean pods."

The scent wafts through the caverns.
